mapper.insert: insert into department(`name`, `parent_id`, `level`, `manager_id`, `operator_id`, `enterprise_id`, `create_time`, `update_time`) values(#{name}, #{parentId}, #{level}, #{managerId}, #{operatorId}, #{enterpriseId}, now(), now())
mapper.select:
select id, name from department d where delete_flg=0
and d.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and d.enterprise_id=#{enterpriseId}
order by id desc
select * from department where delete_flg=0 order by id desc
select d.*, p.name as parentName from department d left join department p on d.parent_id = p.id where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from department where id=#{id}; delete from user_department where department_id=#{id};
